price: 50. Kuwii ka horreeyey baa sidaas yidhi, waxbase uma tarin waxay kasbadeen.
arabic: قَدۡ قَالَهَا ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡ فَمَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qad qālahā alladhīna min qablihim famā aghnā ʿanhum mā kānū yaksibūna
